thread.title: Nikesha

author: Nikesha
title: Nikesha
text: Unlike at lot of businesses, as soon as you walk in the door at Gardner White someone acknowledges your presence and ask what they can do to help you. The sales associates are always friendly, helpful and informative. The app to track your deliver is accurate and the delivery team is amazing. It's just all around great customer service at Gardner White.
